mapper.insert: insert swapwrite (id, title, textarea, loginId, request,idDate, currentTime, endTime,facilityCode) values(#{id}, #{title}, #{textarea}, #{loginId}, 1, #{idDate}, #{currentTime}, #{endTime}, #{facilityCode})
mapper.select: select s.number,s.loginId, s.title, s.textarea, s.request, s.idDate, s.currentTime, s.endTime, s.borrower from user u inner join swapwrite s on u.id = s.id
mapper.update: update swapwrite set request = 0 , borrower = #{borrower} where number = #{number}
